Method Summary
 void compareToIdentical()
          Asserts that Comparable.compareTo(Object) returns zero when given itself.
 void compareToLargerPhase()
          Asserts that Comparable.compareTo(Object) returns a negative number when given another clock with a larger phase.
 void compareToLargerTick()
          Asserts that Comparable.compareTo(Object) returns a negative number when given another clock with a larger tick value.
 void compareToNull()
          Asserts that Comparable.compareTo(Object) fails when given a null.
 void compareToSameTime()
          Asserts that Comparable.compareTo(Object) returns zero when given another clock with the same time.
 void compareToSmallerPhase()
          Asserts that Comparable.compareTo(Object) returns a positive number when given another clock with a smaller phase.
 void compareToSmallerTick()
          Asserts that Comparable.compareTo(Object) returns a positive number when given another clock with a smaller tick value.
 void equalsDifferentPhase()
          Asserts that XClock.equals(Object) returns false when given another clock with a different phase.
 void equalsDifferentTick()
          Asserts that XClock.equals(Object) returns false when given another clock with a different tick value.
 void equalsIdentical()
          Asserts that XClock.equals(Object) returns true when given itself.
 void equalsNonClock()
          Asserts that XClock.equals(Object) returns false when given a non-clock object.
 void equalsNull()
          Asserts that XClock.equals(Object) returns false when given null.
 void equalsSameTime()
          Asserts that XClock.equals(Object) returns true when given another clock with the same time.
 void hashCodeIdentical()
          Asserts that XClock.hashCode() returns the same value on identical instances.
 void hashCodeSameTime()
          Asserts that XClock.hashCode() returns the same value on instances with the same time.
 void incrementPhase()
          Asserts that XClock.increment() on a clock with a non-final phase time will increment the phase and leave the tick unchanged.
 void incrementTick()
          Asserts that XClock.increment() on a clock with a final phase time will increment the tick and set the phase to the initial phase.
 void longConstructorNegativeTickFails()
          Asserts that StandardXClock.StandardXClock(long, StandardTimePhase) fails when given a negative tick.
 void longConstructorNullPhaseFails()
          Asserts that StandardXClock.StandardXClock(long, StandardTimePhase) fails when given a null phase.
 void longConstructorSucceeds()
          Asserts that StandardXClock.StandardXClock(long, StandardTimePhase) succeeds when given reasonable arguments.
 void shortConstructorSucceeds()
          Asserts that StandardXClock.StandardXClock() succeeds.
 void toStringSucceeds()
          Asserts that XClock.toString() succeeds.
